import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Todo from './Todo' import { TodosContext } from '../context/TodosContext' import { ThemeContext } from '../context/ThemeContext' export default function TodoList() { const { todos } = useContext(TodosContext) const { theme, setTheme } = useContext(ThemeContext) const mainColor = theme ? "success" : "dark" const background = theme ? "dark" : "muted" return ( todos.length ? {todos.map((todo) => )}
